mapper.select: select STRMEMBERID as strMemberid, STRREALNAME as strRealname, STRMEMBERCARDNUM as strMembercardnum, STRLEVELSID as strLevelsid from tb_member where STRMEMBERID=#{strMemberId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_weiXinGoods_order ( strOrderId, strMemberId, strMemberCardNumber, strMemberName, strLevelsId, strGoodsId, strGoodsName, iPurchaseAmount, dPrice, strUnitName, dPurchaseCashTotalAmount, dPreferentialPrice, dPreferentialCashTotalAmount, iIntegrationAmount, iPurchaseIntegrationAmount, iStatus, iPayStandard, iPayType, iReceiveType, strReceiveTime, strCreationTime, strLastAccessedTime ) values ( #{strOrderId}, #{strMemberId}, #{strMemberCardNumber}, #{strMemberName}, #{strLevelsId}, #{strGoodsId}, #{strGoodsName}, #{iPurchaseAmount}, #{dPrice}, #{strUnitName}, #{dPurchaseCashTotalAmount}, #{dPreferentialPrice}, #{dPreferentialCashTotalAmount}, #{iIntegrationAmount}, #{iPurchaseIntegrationAmount}, #{iStatus}, #{iPayStandard}, #{iPayType}, #{iReceiveType}, #{strReceiveTime}, #{strCreationTime}, #{strLastAccessedTime} )

insert into tb_receiveGoodsAddress ( strRecordId, strReceiveName, strPhone, strPostalCode, strReceiveAddress, strMemberId, strOrderId, strInsertTime ) values ( #{strRecordId}, #{strReceiveName}, #{strPhone}, #{strPostalCode}, #{strReceiveAddress}, #{strMemberId}, #{strOrderId}, #{strInsertTime} )
mapper.select: select strGoodsId, strGoodsBarCode, strUnitId, strUnitName, strGoodsName, strGoodsTypeId, strGoodsTypeName, strSupplierName, iRequiredIntegral, dEnterPrice, dSalePrice, iStock, iPreferentialType, iState, iIsNewGoods, iIsHotGoods, txtGoodsDesc, txtGoodsDescDetail, strGoodsImg, strEmployeeId, strEmployeeName, strEmployeeLoginName, strInsertTime, strUpdateTime from tb_goods where strGoodsId=#{strGoodsId} and iState=1
select (case when count(strLevelsRightsMappingId)=1 then dDiscount else 1 end) from tb_member_levelsRights_mapping where iRightsStatus=0 and strRightsId=#{strGoodsId} and strLevelsId=#{strLevelsId}
select (case when count(strPreferentialId)=1 then iRequiredIntegral else 0 end) from tb_goodspreferential_mapping where strLevelsId=#{strLevelsId} and strGoodsId=#{strGoodsId}
